description: Fire when a application install is attributed to a campaign (e.g. social media campaign converts user)

af_click_lookback.description: Maximum period of time after an ad is clicked within which an install can be attributed to the ad. Installs that take place after the lookback window are considered Organic.

install_time.description: The time that the install occurred in UTC (e.g. '2018-12-24 14:29:33.738').
